DataElement.preferredDefinition: A tickbox indicator as to whether or not an email alert is to be sent.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._The act or process of following a person, animal, or object through space or time._Cause or enable to go or be conveyed or transmitted._E-mail is short for "electronic mail" and refers to composing, sending, and receiving messages over electronic communication systems. Most e-mail systems use the Internet._Condition of heightened watchfulness or preparation for action.
